name: Ice Rocket
description:
Challenge and great cartoon visual in Ice Rocket!
Are you bored of slow and not dynamic racing games? If you say "YES" you must try power game Ice Rocket. This is fast and hard difficulty level game. You still want play one more time and you never want finish. Play, beat best scores and exciting the dynamic action!

Game Features:
- challenge
- leaderboards
- achievements
- great cartoon visual
- three difficulty levels
- fast paced
- unique race system
- easy to play
- hard to master
- wonderfully animations

Reach the best score!
